unnormalised: Hey folks, energy bills stressing you out? Looks like gas cylinder prices are doing their usual pre-Diwali drama! Sources say Bharat Petroleum and Indane might be tweaking rates again soon.
normalised: Hey folks, energy bills stressing you out? Looks like gas cylinder prices are doing their usual pre-Diwali drama! Sources say Bharat Petroleum and Indane might be tweaking rates again soon.

unnormalised: Remember last month's Rs. 50 hike? Well, whispers in the chai stalls of Chandni Chowk suggest another bump is on the cards. This is hitting everyone, from auntyjis making biryani for the family to street vendors frying samosas.
normalised: Remember last month's rupee fifty hike? Well, whispers in the chai stalls of Chandni Chowk suggest another bump is on the cards. This is hitting everyone, from auntyjis making biryani for the family to street vendors frying samosas.

unnormalised: Experts are blaming fluctuating global crude oil prices and, of course, good old supply and demand. "It's a yearly ritual," says energy analyst, Mr. Sharma from IIT Delhi. "Just like waiting for Onam sadhya, we brace ourselves for this."
normalised: Experts are blaming fluctuating global crude oil prices and, of course, good old supply and demand. "It's a yearly ritual," says energy analyst, Mister Sharma from I I T Delhi. "Just like waiting for Onam sadhya, we brace ourselves for this."

unnormalised: Households are now thinking twice before ordering extra cylinders. Some are even considering going back to using induction cooktops, or maybe even wood-burning stoves! Will Modi jiâ€™s government intervene to ease the pressure on our pockets? Only time will tell! Keep an eye out for official announcements.
normalised: Households are now thinking twice before ordering extra cylinders. Some are even considering going back to using induction cooktops, or maybe even wood-burning stoves! Will Modi ji's government intervene to ease the pressure on our pockets? Only time will tell! Keep an eye out for official announcements.
